### Prepare the data
```{r}
pollution = read_csv("./pollution_us_2000_2016_short.csv") %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  mutate(date = mdy(date)) %>%
  arrange(date)
  
```

### Seperate the pollutant
```{r}
NO2_pollutant = pollution %>%
  select(state_code:date, no2_mean:no2_aqi)

O3_pollutant = pollution %>%
  select(state_code:date, o3_mean:o3_aqi)
  

SO2_pollutant = pollution %>%
  select(state_code:date, so2_mean:so2_aqi)

CO_pollutant = pollution %>%
  select(state_code:date, co_mean:co_aqi) 

```

### Create longitudinal plot for four pollutants
```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_line(data = NO2_pullutant, aes(date, no2_mean))
```
